languages.text: "Быть может, так поет тебе твое тело, но усталость души и разума заметить намного сложнее".
"Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, так поет тебе твое тело, но усталость души и разума заметить намного сложнее".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps your body sings it to you this way, but the exhaustion of the mind and soul is much harder to notice."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps your body sings it to you this way, but the exhaustion of the mind and soul is much harder to notice."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

languages.text: “或许你的身体确实很健康，但精神与灵魂的疲倦更难以察觉，更容易被忽略。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

traits.locale_text: “或许你的身体确实很健康，但精神与灵魂的疲倦更难以察觉，更容易被忽略。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez sea esa canción la que tu cuerpo te canta, pero el agotamiento de mente y alma es mucho más sutil y se obvia fácilmente».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez sea esa canción la que tu cuerpo te canta, pero el agotamiento de mente y alma es mucho más sutil y se obvia fácilmente».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est peut-être ce que vous chante votre corps, mais l'épuisement de l'esprit et de l'âme est bien plus difficile à percevoir. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

traits.locale_text: « C'est peut-être ce que vous chante votre corps, mais l'épuisement de l'esprit et de l'âme est bien plus difficile à percevoir. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das mag das Lied sein, das Euer Körper Euch vorsingt, aber die Erschöpfung von Geist und Seele ist subtiler und kann leicht übersehen werden."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

traits.locale_text: "Das mag das Lied sein, das Euer Körper Euch vorsingt, aber die Erschöpfung von Geist und Seele ist subtiler und kann leicht übersehen werden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「それは、お前の身体が歌いかける歌なのだろう。だが、心と魂の疲弊はより繊細で、簡単に見逃してしまいがちだ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

traits.locale_text: 「それは、お前の身体が歌いかける歌なのだろう。だが、心と魂の疲弊はより繊細で、簡単に見逃してしまいがちだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Belki bedenin sana öyle söylüyordur ama zihin ve ruh yorgunluğu çok daha zor algılanır ve kolayca gözden kaçabilir."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps that is the song your body sings to you, but the exhaustion of mind and soul is much more subtle and easily missed."

traits.locale_text: "Belki bedenin sana öyle söylüyordur ama zihin ve ruh yorgunluğu çok daha zor algılanır ve kolayca gözden kaçabilir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
